channel.title: Music – Hennie Dolsma
channel.description: Recent content in Hennie Dolsma on Music

item.title: Hennie Dolsma - I Would Rather Go Blind
item.description:
작곡: Foster, Jordan / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8971

Something told me
it was over
When I saw you
and him talking
Something deep down
in my soul
Said cry girl
when I saw you
And out walking
I would rather
I would rather
go blind boy
Than to see you
walk away from me
So you see
I love you so much
And I don’t want to
see you leave me baby
But most all I don’t
want to be free
I was just
I was just
I was just
sitting here thinking
Of what’s your kiss
and your warm embrace
When the reflection
in the glass
That I hold
to my lips baby
Revealed the tears
I had on my face
I would rather
go blind way
Than to see you
walk away from me
So you see
I love you so much
And I don’t want to
see you leave me baby
The most of all
I don’t want
To be free
baby baby baby
I would rather
go blind
Than to see you
walk away from me
Baby baby baby I would
rather go blind
Than to see you
walk away from me-
